hero.title: About Ganesh Steel
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Manufacturing Since 1998
hero.description: Ganesh Steel has been a trusted manufacturer of precision door hardware for over 25 years. Our commitment to quality and innovation drives us to deliver superior door hinges and stoppers that meet the highest industry standards.

meta.title: Ganesh Steel - Door Hardware Manufacturing Excellence Since 1998
meta.description: Leading manufacturer of high-quality door hinges and stoppers with 25 years of industrial expertise and precision engineering.

items.title: CNC Precision Machinery

items.content: Ganesh Steel is a leading manufacturer of precision door hinges and stoppers, established in 1998 with a commitment to delivering superior hardware solutions. With 25 years of industry experience, we specialize in high-quality manufacturing for diverse architectural and construction needs.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive product design using advanced CAD technologies

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Rigorous selection of high-grade steel and materials

items.title: Quality Control
items.description: Comprehensive testing and inspection at multiple stages

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Advanced finishing techniques for durability and aesthetics

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and efficient logistics management
